title: Pawn Shop
mainText: {i:tap=3}, Put a resource card into Pawn Shop: Add {r:shinies=x}.{section}If pawn shop is not tapped, any player may pay {r:shinies=x} to add the card in the Pawn Shop to their hand. X is equal to the value of the card in the pawn shop.
flavourText: There is always someone who finds value in the random booze bottles and rocks you have.
